about_the_game:
Mystic Strife is a fast-paced chaotic party fighting game for up to eight friends. Choose one of six characters with unique abilities and prepare yourself for a simple yet surprisingly deep platforming deathmatch!

Characters:

  • Ranger: Equipped with a bow and three recoverable arrows.
  • Wizard: Slings a torrent of fireballs and can cast a powerful long-range magic beam.
  • Necromancer: Raises the dead to muster a legion of skeletons that persist through rounds.
  • Rogue: Eqipped with a hookshot to quickly manuever around the stage and to pull in her foes.
  • Engineer: Equiped with a reloadable musket and can build repairable turrets.
  • Dragoon: Weilding a lance, she can take to the skies with a mighty leap and come crashing down with a powerful shockwave.

Key Features:

  • Tight platforming controls that are simple to learn, hard to master.
  • Deflect physical projectiles back at your opponents with a well-timed strike.
  • Pick up various powerups like shields, speed boosts and more.
  • Six unique characters.
  • Nine playable stages.

PLEASE NOTE: This game has no single-player content. It must be played with your buddies IRL or through Steam Remote Play. (Buddies not included)

Mystic Strife is a fast-paced chaotic party fighting game for up to eight friends. Choose one of six characters with unique abilities and prepare yourself for a simple yet surprisingly deep platforming deathmatch!

Characters:

  • Ranger: Equipped with a bow and three recoverable arrows.
  • Wizard: Slings a torrent of fireballs and can cast a powerful long-range magic beam.
  • Necromancer: Raises the dead to muster a legion of skeletons that persist through rounds.
  • Rogue: Eqipped with a hookshot to quickly manuever around the stage and to pull in her foes.
  • Engineer: Equiped with a reloadable musket and can build repairable turrets.
  • Dragoon: Weilding a lance, she can take to the skies with a mighty leap and come crashing down with a powerful shockwave.

Key Features:

  • Tight platforming controls that are simple to learn, hard to master.
  • Deflect physical projectiles back at your opponents with a well-timed strike.
  • Pick up various powerups like shields, speed boosts and more.
  • Six unique characters.
  • Nine playable stages.

PLEASE NOTE: This game has no single-player content. It must be played with your buddies IRL or through Steam Remote Play. (Buddies not included)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of VRAM recommended
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Mystic Strife

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of VRAM recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
